category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 23 (Principles of Disciplinary Action)
contents: Article 23 (Principles of disciplinary action) The establishment and decision of disciplinary charges shall be in accordance with the regulations at the time of conduct, and shall be determined by the Committee and the Member Sports Organization or Member City/Provincial Sports Association Sports Fair Committee pursuant to Article 22 (hereinafter *Event Committee or City/Provincial Committee D). shall be punished by giving priority to evidence. [Title revised on January 24, 2022] [Fully revised on January 24, 2022]
